## RStudio Integrated Development Environment (IDE)
![](/introduction/installing_rstudio/images/r-ide.png?classes=shadow)

RStudio is an IDE that consolidates everything you need to write R code and work with data in a single app.

It allows you to browse help files, plots, and keep track of objects in your environment easily.
